long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fire boy and Water girl Game is available in the chrome web store just install it and play Fire boy and Water girl Game.

Fire boy and Water girl is adventure game. They boldly descend into dark caves and venture into ancient temples hunting for diamonds. You need to help them collect all the gems on the level using their unusual abilities!

Fire boy and Water girl are joining forces! Help them stay safe on their next series of amazing journeys. Collecting priceless jewels in ancient temples is their specialties. You can tag along with them on their treasure hunts in these Fire boy & Water girl games. They’ll be using their amazing powers to get past all sorts of tricky hazards and traps. Needless to say, Fire boy can handle fire, but he can’t stand H2O. Meanwhile, Water girl really doesn’t like anything that’s too hot in these awesome and addictive adventure games.

                  How to Play:-

                                           Arrow keys to control Fire boy
                                          WASD keys to control Water girl
                                           Fire boy cannot touch water
                                           Water girl cannot touch fire
                                           Neither can touch green lakes
